title: Decrease in nominal wages shifts SRAS right

content.prompt: A decrease in nominal wages will cause the

choices.label: real output to remain the same
long-run aggregate supply curve to shift to the left
short-run aggregate supply curve to shift to the right
aggregate demand curve to shift to the right

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
